mapper.insert: insert into tb_wxmember_address( wxmember_address_id, contacts, sex, contacts_number, corporate_name, address_id, floor_numbe, wxmember_id, createtime, updatetime ) values ( #{wxmember_address_id}, #{contacts}, #{sex}, #{contacts_number}, #{corporate_name}, #{address_id}, #{floor_numbe}, #{wxmember_id}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select count(*) concat(b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe) as address from tb_wxmember_address a left join tb_address b on a.address_id=b.address_id where concat(b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe) like concat('%',concat(#{content},'%'))
group by b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe

select a.wxmember_address_id, a.contacts, a.sex, a.contacts_number, a.corporate_name, a.floor_numbe, b.address_name, concat(b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe) as address from tb_wxmember_address a left join tb_address b on a.address_id=b.address_id where a.wxmember_id = #{wxmember_id}

select a.wxmember_address_id, a.contacts, a.sex, a.contacts_number, a.corporate_name, a.floor_numbe, b.address_name, concat(b.address_name,a.corporate_name,a.floor_numbe) as address from tb_wxmember_address a left join tb_address b on a.address_id=b.address_id where a.wxmember_address_id = #{wxmember_address_id}
